British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Year 9 Parents' Consultation takes place between 5pm and 7pm on Tuesday 18th March, and we are trialling a new appointment booking system using Google Docs. You will notice that some staff have appointments available from 4.30pm, and some are blocked out until 5.00pm. I would like to give those staff that want to the opportunity to meet from 4.30pm, but many will be involved in ASAs until 4.15pm and will need a break.
Please bear the following in mind when booking an appointment: 1. Click on the link below. 2. Use tabs at bottom to locate subjects and your child's teacher. 3. Type your child's name into an available slot. 4. Please do not delete anyone else's appointments. 5. Once you have typed your child's name in, the appointment will be saved automatically - you do not have to save anywhere else. 6. Please make a note of your appointments and bring it with you.
https://docs.google.com/a/britishschool.edu.my/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0Ah45ozzFTKz-dE5vLUQ1LTU1R1lYNkFyMUFySl9mcmc&usp=sharing#gid=20
Yours sincerely
Derek Mackey Head of Secondary British International School Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
